1.content: Which story do you want to read?
1.title: Story Time!

choices: Triple D vs their opponents/Your Choice.
11.content:
Once upon a time there happened to be a heroic group of anthropomorphic cartoon animals who of course happen to be well known and respected massively big and fat pro wrestlers as well.

The Place: Long Beach California.

The Time: The Summer of 2019.

The Story's characters in other words a five dog band of anthropomorphic cartoon animals who are massively big and fat face aligned pro wrestlers:

The Leader: Ace Jones an anthropomorphic animated dog as his in ring name is Dog Kong.

The Lancer: Pork Chop an anthropomorphic animated dog who happens to be Ace's right hand mutt, as his in ring name is the amazing colossal mutt.

The Smart Guy: Dawkins the dalmatian from 101 Dalmatian Street who happens to be the team's resident genius as his in ring name is the big dog.

The Big Guy: Hansel the husky from 101 Dalmatian street who happens to be the strong dog of the group as he was originally from Vienna Austria before he moved to Long Beach California U.S.A. as his in ring name is The Austrian Dream Machine.

The Chicks: Destiny Dallas and Deja Vu dalmatian from 101 Dalmatian Street as they're always the voice of reason of course, as they're a 3 dog tag team known as Triple D as all 3 members of their tag team also compete separately in singles matches as well as they along with their brother Dawkins originally happened to be from London United Kingdom before they moved here to the states as well.

The Story: It all started one sunny day as a flyer for a worldwide pro wrestling tournament got my attention as I brought in that flyer for everyone to see.

"I found this flyer for a worldwide pro wrestling tournament that's going to be held here in Long Beach California in a few days time." I said as I showed this flyer to everyone.

"So you say a worldwide pro wrestling tournament is going to be held here in Long Beach California in a few days time? I'm in." Pork Chop wholeheartedly said.

"I'd say this will be a good chance to show off our pro wrestling skills and prove to the world that our country's wrestlers are the strongest in the world." Dawkins said as he was feeling quite confident of course.

"I agree for after all I can't wait to get into the ring and show my opponents what I'm made of." Hansel said as he was quite interested in entering this worldwide pro wrestling tournament.

"When all 3 of us are together we always crush our competition right girls?" Destiny proudly asked her sisters.

"You know it sis!" Dallas and Deja Vu proudly answered.

It was at that time each of us started training for the upcoming worldwide pro wrestling tournament of course.

Now what will happen next?
11.title: Story 1

14.content:
You are a 16 year old boy called Billy.

You had just gotten back from your holiday in France and you and your family are collecting your bags. You are talking to your mum about cucumbers and you pick up your bag and go home. As you are walking into your house your sister pushes you and you fall in a large puddle.
"For **** sake, why the hell did you do that?"

" 'cause it's funny!" Said my sister

You stand up, dripping wet.

"Oh Billy! Get in the house now and get changed!" Your mum shouts

You run upstairs to your bedroom and take all your clothes off. You then open your bags to put different clothes on.

But they are not your clothes, they are.

1541.content:
Your clothes are being cleaned at the launderettes. You are going to collect them but you fall in some mud just outside the launderettes and are covered in mud

"Well... Shit" you say, getting back up.

You walk in and can't wait to get home and put different clothes on. It is almost closed, it is only you and another wan in there, well, it could of been a man you could not really tell, you are both putting your clothes into bags. After you have put them in the bags, you quickly go to the toilet, when you get back, the woman/man is gone and there is only one bag left. You pick it up and go home.

When you get home you need to change out off your muddy clothes. You look in the bag and realise you have the wrong one.

You quickly rush to the launderettes but alas, it's closed.

You drive back home, wandering what to do.

When you get home you start looking through the bag. It is filled with skirts, dresses, stockings, pantyhose, panties, bras, corsets, heels, fake breasts, wigs and for some reason, diapers.

You sigh, the most masculine clothes you can find is a pair of very small blue short shorts that nearly cover the pink panties you are forced to wear, a blue crop top and a pair of 7.5 inch heels.

With the fake breasts, a wig and some leftover makeup you have from a costume party, you could probably make a rather convincing girl. After all, you are skinny with a larger than average butt and a small waist, why not experiment a bit?
Your alone all day.

You do need your clothes back at some point though and you have the phone number of the dry cleaners.

1551.content:
You and your female friend, Catherine (not girlfriend) are in your room.

"I bet you can't sneak into your little sister's room, steal a diaper and wear it" Catherine said

You had liked Catherine in the past, like liked her but had been friend zoned so you pretended you didn't still fancy her, but she was simply so good looking, other's would say her body was so good it was like that of a model, she had even been offered a job as a model once but turned it down as she was smarter than that.

Anyway back to the story.

"Errr... Yeah, I can do that" I saw it as an opportunity to impress her

I snuck in and grabbed a pink diaper with a princess on, I put it on and was walking back to my room in just the diaper when my big sister spotted me, she's 17.

"What is the seven hell's are you doing?!" She said and laughed

"I- I, it's a dare" i said, face like a tomato

"Yeah whatever" she said and walked off

I walked into my room, Catherine was sitting on the floor, as soon as she saw me she giggled and then burst out in laughter.

"Ha! Your sister saw you, you've got to wear diaper to school!"

"What I never I agreed to this!" I said angrily

"Yes you did!" She said, I was surprised she was actually getting angry about this

"ok, I'll wear a diaper to school tommorow" I said

"Promise?"

"Yes i promise" I said

"Fine but first say 'I'm a pretty little thissy girl who lovths to dweth up in little baby clothes'" she said

"I'm a pretty little sissy girl who loves to dress up in little pink baby clothes" I said

"You better wear a diaper tommorow or everyone will know you wore a diaper and your a little baby girl, I filmed it"


*the next day*

info.brief_description: For those who are trying to learn the ropes, this is the interactive to use.
info.description:
This interactive is made for anyone to come and learn how to add a chapter to interactives by adding a story. But first for the rules.
1. No sex in any way
2. No vore
3. No inflation
